name: Individual Hex Bangles
description:
Drape your wrist in deeper meaning with our Baby Hex Bangles. An openwork design with repetitive mosaic-style detailing alludes to the complex truth that lies beneath every shiny exterior.

Here you have the option to purchase the bangles separately.

Inner diameter is 2.45" x 2.00"

Each set comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

Here you have the option to purchase bangles one by one.

name: 2 Day UPS shipping
description: When you need it there faster.

name: Ground Down- the impermanence pencil
description:
Cast from an actual pencil, this timeless brass piece by Metta Metalworks is a subtle yet poignant reference to the impermanence of everything.

Necklace is 26" long with spring closure. Casting is 2".
The pencils is cast from solid brass and oxidized to a worn antiqued finish.  The box chain is brass plated with an oxidized silver finish.

Each piece comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Baby Hex Bangle Set
description:
Drape your wrist in deeper meaning with this set of three Baby Hex Bangles. An openwork design with repetitive mosaic-style detailing alludes to the complex truth that lies beneath every shiny exterior.

The set comes with two Brass and one Sterling Silver.  The bangles have an oval shape which we find feels better on the wrist.

Inner diameter is 2.45" x 2.00"

Each set comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Double Koti two tone earring
description:
According to the Buddhist saying, “He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.” However, we wouldn’t worry too much about coveting these earrings from Metta Metalworks.

Koti means point in the ancient pali language. The cast elements reminded me of double terminated crystals which represent the integration of spirit and matter.

This earring is 2" long and has sterling silver ear wires

Each piece comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Double Koti Y neck
description:
According to the Buddhist saying, “He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.” However, we think it’s probably okay to covet this necklace from Metta Metalworks.

Koti means point in the ancient pali language. The cast elements reminded me of double terminated crystals which represent the integration of spirit and matter.

Necklace is 26" long with a lobster claw closure and logo hang tag. Small casting is 1”, large casting is 1.5”. Drop length is .25"

Each piece comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Double Koti long earring
description:
According to the Buddhist saying, “He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.” However, we wouldn’t worry too much about coveting these earrings from Metta Metalworks.

Koti means point in the ancient pali language. The cast elements reminded me of double terminated crystals which represent the integration of spirit and matter.

This earring is 3.5" long and has sterling silver ear wires

Each piece comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Koti Station Necklace
description:
According to the Buddhist saying, “He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.” However, we think it’s probably okay to covet this necklace from Metta Metalworks.

Koti means point in the ancient pali language.  The cast elements reminded me of double terminated crystals which represent the  integration of spirit and matter.

This necklace is 31” with a 2" logo extender. Small castings are 1", large casting is 1.5"

Each piece comes packaged in a colorful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Udessa Ring
description:
The perfect compliment to either of the Udessa bangles.

This ring is sterling silver with a light oxidation to bring out the pattern. The band measures 12.5mm and the pattern based on Moroccan mossaic tile work.  With wider rings like this it is wise to order half a size up. 

The name of this collection is derived from the Pali word Udessa which means to recite or repeat point by point.

name: Hexagon Drop
description:
This sweet little drop will quickly become your favorite every day earring.

The earrings are oxidized sterling silver. The ear wires are sterling silver as well. The diameter of the earring is 10.25 mm.

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Alchemy Pendant
description:
We came across this amazing piece while sorting through a large bag of vintage buttons that we had purchased.  

The symbol of the eye in the palm of a hand references the alchemic union of awareness and action.  

The necklace is 20" long with a lobster claw closure and a 2" logo extender.  The oxidized sterling silver charm hangs from an eclectic mix of silver plated chains and vintage bar link elements.

Your necklace comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Udessa Morning Star Pendant
description:
Based on Moroccan patterning- the open work metal design on this bangle alludes to the truths that lie beneath the surface.

The necklace is 20" long with a lobster claw closure and a 2" logo extender chain.  The oxidized brasspendant mesures 1.25" in diameter and hangs from brass and silver plated chains with vintage bar link details.

The name of this collection is derived from the Pali word Udessa which means to recite or repeat point by point.

Your necklace comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Hobo Nickel Ring
description:
This ring is a real conversation starter.

A rebellious, depression era artform hobo nickels are coins that have been altered using engraving and chasing techniques.  

We have had our engraver (crazy old-school guy- think Russian Icons and the like) put his talent to work on a genuine 1935 Buffalo Nickel we found at a flea market- he altered the Indian head on the front to make a skull and engraving the MMW logo into the belly of the Buffalo in the back.  This coin was then molded so we can cast the nickel in Brass to get the two tone effect you see on the ring.

The ring shank is sterling silver with an elegant yet sturdy tapered design which makes it very comfortable to wear.  The silver is oxidized and hand finished to give it a worn, vintage feel.

Your ring comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Udessa Bangle
description:
Based on Moroccan patterning- the open work metal design on this bangle alludes to the truths that lie beneath the surface.

The name of this collection is derived from the Pali word Udessa which means to recite or repeat point by point.

The oval shape of this bangle makes it very comfortable and easy to wear. The opening is 2.5" by 2.25". It is just over 1/2 inch wide. The MMW logo has been worked into the pattern.

Made from Bronze infused stainless steel this bracelet is created using metal printing technologies- the surface has a delicate stipple pattern that belies the process used to create it.

Available in Bronze- which looks like Chocolate Gold 
Stainless Steel- which looks like oxidized Sterling

Your bangle comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Udessa Bangle  Wide
description:
Based on Moroccan patterning- the open work metal design on this bangle alludes to the truths that lie beneath the surface.  

The name of this collection is derived from the Pali word Udessa which means to recite or repeat point by point.   

The oval shape of this bangle make it very comfortable and easy to wear. The opening is 2.5" by 2.25".  It is just shy of 1 inch wide.  The MMW logo has been worked into the pattern.


Made from Bronze infused stainless steel this bracelet is created using metal printing technologies- the surface has a delicate stipple pattern that belies the process used to create it.  

Available in Bronze- which looks like Chocolate Gold
Stainless Steel- which looks like oxidized Sterling

Your bangle comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Rose Radius Earring
description:
The delicate design of these earrings is inspired by Moroccan art and stained glass windows.  The airy openwork pattern makes it light enough to wear every day.  

The earrings are sterling silver with a light antique effect.  The ear wires are sterling silver as well.  The diameter of the earring is 42mm.

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Lotus Flower Incense Holder with incense
description:
This incense holder was designed by Josh for the Metta Metalworks line.  It's just under 1.5" wide by 1/2" tall.

The set comes packaged in a signature MMW amulet bag and includes one lovely, hand finished Lotus Flower incense holder in oxidized brass and one box of 20 sticks of "Wake Up" from Fragrance Memories, a high quality Japanese incense with key notes of lime, pink pepper and bergamot.

name: Be Happy Anyway Necklace
description:
This necklace measures 20" long. The charm is about 35 X 33 mm- you can see the images for scale.  The charms are cast in either brass or white bronze and are oxidzed.  The chains are base metal and are plated to match.  They close with a lobster claw and have the MMW logo engraved in the back side.  

This past summer I attended the Dharma Punx silent retreat this  and our schedule included an afternoon Yoga class.  The instructor was talking to us about the difficulties we all encounter and she said- "You can be happy despite life's difficulties"  It was just one of those moments when you really see- Yes!  that's totally true.  I can be happy anyway.... the problem is remembering that when crappy stuff happens.  

Available in White Bronze Ox or Brass Ox please make a choice on check out.

Every MMW piece comes packaged in a lovely amulet bag made by Monks in Nepal.

name: GOODWILL- The 3 keys to happiness
description:
Oxidized Sterling silver GRATITUDE key pendant. 16 inches long on a silver plated brass chain,lobster claw closure. The keys range in size slightly- but are all around 35mm tall.

Sold separately- choose one or layer them all. Gratitude, Generosity, Goodwill

These pendants were based on a talk that my husband, Josh Korda, gave at Dharma Punx NYC. 

He talked about the 3 G's of Gratitude, Goodwill and Generosity. In Buddhist teaching these are the antidotes to Hatred, Craving and Self Centered Ignorance- some of the many causes of human suffering and things we can all live with out.

As I was recounting the talk to a friend- I accidentally called them the three keys- and was struck by the idea of combining the two images. 

I had a huge bag of vintage keys in my bench- but I didn't want my keys to look like all the other keys out there- so I set to work on a banner that could weave through the key carrying the message.

The oxidized feel keys have a worn, urban-vinatage style- and they work great for girls and guys alike. Josh wears the longer leather/chain version all the time.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: GRATITUDE- The 3 Keys to lasting happiness
description:
Oxidized Sterling silver GRATITUDE key pendant. 16 inches long on a silver plated brass chain,lobster claw closure. The keys range in size slightly- but are all around 35mm tall.

Sold separately- choose one or layer them all. Gratitude, Generosity, Goodwill

These pendants were based on a talk that my husband, Josh Korda, gave at Dharma Punx NYC. 

He talked about the 3 G's of Gratitude, Goodwill and Generosity. In Buddhist teaching these are the antidotes to Hatred, Craving and Self Centered Ignorance- some of the many causes of human suffering and things we can all live with out.

As I was recounting the talk to a friend- I accidentally called them the three keys- and was struck by the idea of combining the two images. 

I had a huge bag of vintage keys in my bench- but I didn't want my keys to look like all the other keys out there- so I set to work on a banner that could weave through the key carrying the message.

The oxidized feel keys have a worn, urban-vinatage style- and they work great for girls and guys alike. Josh wears the longer leather/chain version all the time.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Sterling Watch Fob Necklace
description:
This is a beautiful piece- cast from a very old European watch Fob that I came across in a small vintage shop.

The piece is cast in sterling silver and oxidized to achieve that worn vintage feel.

I've hung it on a grey cotton cord that has a slip knot closure so that the piece is very adjustable. At it's longest length it is 26" and tightens to 16" with the knots closer to the front.

If gray is not your color - let me know and we can find other options.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: GENEROSITY- The 3 keys to lasting happiness
description:
Oxidized Sterling silver GRATITUDE key pendant. 16 inches long on a silver plated brass chain,lobster claw closure. The keys range in size slightly- but are all around 35mm tall.

Sold separately- choose one or layer them all. Gratitude, Generosity, Goodwill

These pendants were based on a talk that my husband, Josh Korda, gave at Dharma Punx NYC. 

He talked about the 3 G's of Gratitude, Goodwill and Generosity. In Buddhist teaching these are the antidotes to Hatred, Craving and Self Centered Ignorance- some of the many causes of human suffering and things we can all live with out.

As I was recounting the talk to a friend- I accidentally called them the three keys- and was struck by the idea of combining the two images. 

I had a huge bag of vintage keys in my bench- but I didn't want my keys to look like all the other keys out there- so I set to work on a banner that could weave through the key carrying the message.

The oxidized feel keys have a worn, urban-vinatage style- and they work great for girls and guys alike. Josh wears the longer leather/chain version all the time.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: LOVE necklace
description:
Sweet as can be- the gift that says it all for you.

The center charm is sterling silver and measures 20x17 mm- about the size of a nickel if you squashed it oval.  The chain and lobster claw are plated brass chain.  The piece is lightly oxidized and has a easy, worn vintage feel to it.

The textured bars are links from vintage chain that I've up-cycled and are a nice contrast to the clean lines of the central charm. 

The necklace measures 16" with a 2" logo extender.

All of our pieces come packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Monks in Nepal.

name: You Are My Anchor- Double charm necklace
description:
Silver double charm necklace. The main pendant is a round disk of oxidized silver with a hexagon shape cut out. The interior reads "You are my" Hanging on top is a delicate shiny silver anchor.
The necklace hangs at 16 inches. The main charm is the size of a quarter- and has the Metta Metalworks logo on the back side. The anchor is the size of a dime and is fully dimensional. The chain is silver plated. The charms are both sterling.

I like to be reminded of the things that are important in life- the things that "anchor" me in the moment, or to things that really matter.

Everyone has some kind of anchor in their life-- however if you want to customize this piece
I'm happy to chat about other options!

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Anchor's Away Ring
description:
The shank of the ring is sterling silver and has a great ribbed and serrated texture around the bezel. It also has the MMW logo engraved inside the shank.

The oxidized brass insert was cast off a vintage button and is a bit smaller than a quarter ($0.25 us). 

It features a relief carving of an anchor inside an 8 pointed starburst pattern.  We're particularly drawn to the 8 pointed star. Over the life of the MMW line it has come to represent the 8 fold path.  So in this case you're anchored in the path.... or it's just a cool ring.

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Owl Ring
description:
The shank of the ring is sterling silver and has a great ribbed and serrated texture around the bezel.

The insert was cast off a vintage button and is slightly smaller than a penny ($0.01 us). 

It features a relief carving of the face of an owl. It is brass and has an oxidized finish.

The ring is stocked in size 7- other sizes will be made to order.

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: LAYERING NECKLACE- SEMI PRECIOUS
description:
I get so many compliments on these necklaces- I throw them on with whatever else I'm wearing that day.  They ad a touch of color and texture
to the grouping and you have tons of colors to choose from.

A little design note-- I changed the square logo to the traditional open MMW logo.  

All MMW purchases come with their own beautiful amulet bag made by monks in Nepal.

name: Snake Pendant on leather cord
description:
This is a reproduction of a beautiful old piece I found at a flea market in the Catskills.  The seller claimed it was Italian from the early 1900's- 

Originally a belt, I've removed the second snake and changed the orientation, hanging it on a soft leather cord.  

It has a double slip knot closure which makes the piece adjustable from about 18" to 34".  There is a little MMW logo hang tag trapped at the back.

name: Shoulder duster earrings- silver, pink, orange
description:
Lovely long fringe earring with dyed jade and seed bead pops of color.
90 mm/ 3.5 inch drop.  Sterling silver fish wires.
Silver plated brass

These earrings have a worn, urban-vintage style look. Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Alchemy Ring
description:
We came across this amazing piece while sorting through a large bag of vintage buttons that we had purchased.

The symbol of the eye in the palm of a hand references the alchemic union of awareness and action.

The shank of the ring is sterling silver and has a great ribbed and serrated texture around the bezel. The button has been reproduced in an oxidized brass finish to create the two tone effect you see.  
The MMW logo engraved inside the shank.

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: OMG!  baby size OMG necklace
description:
Cheap and cheerful- perfect as a holiday hostess gift or for someone's stocking.

The OMG charm is sterling silver with a worn finish and is the size of a penny if you squished it oval.  

The chain and lobster claw closure are plated base metal and have the same worn silver finish.

Every piece we sell comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Monks in Nepal.

name: Arrow Ring- Sterling Silver
description:
Oxidized Sterling silver signet ring with arrow icon. 
The oval is 25 x 14 mm. Great for guys or ladies. Available in sizes 7,8,9,10. Please indicate size when you order.

These rings were based on a talk that my husband, Josh Korda, gave at Dharma Punx NYC.

The Buddhist story of the Second Arrow is a great metaphor for the pain we apply after the fact.

In layman's words- it goes like this: When something hurts us we have the tendency to roll around in it- maybe we blog about it- write angry emails about it, stew in the outrage of "how could they!", etc. So we feel two pains- the initial pain and then the added mental pain.

"Just as if you were to shoot a man with an arrow and, right afterward, were to shoot him with another one, so that he would feel the pains of two arrows" 

The ring has a worn, urban-vintage style- and work great for girls and guys alike. Josh wears his on his pinky- but that is only because he couldn't wait for one his size.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

If you are interested in reading the entire second arrow story you can access it at http://www.accesstoinsight.org/tipitaka/sn/sn36/sn36.006.than.html

name: TAKEN - Humorous Urban Vintage Necklace
description:
Who said gifts have to be overly traditional or without humor! Too many people feel bound by the staid traditions of chocolates and flowers, when a gift that's spirited can display a creative and thoughtful spirit. So here is Metta Metalworks's spin off all the traditional
"be mine" "I'm yours" Valentine's day jabber.

It can be a smarmy gift for your special some one, a charm to placate your co-dependent partner or for your-self as message to all those unwanted admirers!

The charm measures 16mm X 28 mm and is .925 sterling silver with an oxidized and slightly brushed finish and hangs on a sterling silver cable chain.

The overall measurement is 16" and has a lobster claw closure and a brass MMW hang tag. 
I can make the necklace longer if you'd like to wear it lower.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Sterling Fob Necklace
description:
This is a beautiful piece- cast from a very old European watch Fob that I came across
in a small vintage shop.

The piece is cast in sterling silver- the central plaque is plated with a rose gold.
You could engrave an initial or a date easily. There is a beautiful hand engraved pattern all around the central shield and I've oxidized the piece to highlight the pattern.

I've hung it on a grey cotton cord that has a slip knot closure so that the piece is very adjustable. At it's longest length it is 26" and tightens to 16" with the knots closer to the front.

If gray is not your color - let me know and we can find other options.

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: Shoulder duster earrings- silver, citrus black
description:
Lovely long fringe earring with citrus agate beads.
90 mm/ 3.5 inch drop.  Sterling silver fish wires.
Silver plated brass

These earrings have a worn, urban-vintage style look. Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: SECOND ARROW Necklace - Buddhist themed necklace
description:
Oxidized Sterling silver double layer pendant with arrow and arrow icon on Gold plated brass chain with lobster claw closure. Top arrow sits at 16" the oval sits at 20"
The oval is 25 x 14 mm.

This necklace was based on a talk that my husband, Josh Korda, gave at Dharma Punx NYC.

The Buddhist story of the Second Arrow is a great metaphor for the pain we apply after the fact.

In layman's words- it goes like this: When something hurts us we have the tendency to roll around in it- maybe we blog about it- write angry emails about it, stew in the outrage of "how could they!", etc. So we feel two pains- the initial pain and then the added mental pain.

"Just as if you were to shoot a man with an arrow and, right afterward, were to shoot him with another one, so that he would feel the pains of two arrows"

The double arrow pendant has a worn, urban-vintage style look to it. Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

Ten percent of my profits are donated to the monasteries where my teachers live. Saranaloka Buddhist Nuns Community and to Wat Metta Monastery- both are located in California.

If you are interested in reading the entire second arrow story you can access it at http://www.accesstoinsight.org/tipitaka/sn/sn36/sn36.006.than.html

name: Shoulder duster earrings- silver, red, blue
description:
Lovely long fringe earring with vintage millefiori glass beads.
90 mm/ 3.5 inch drop.  Sterling silver fish wires.
Silver plated brass

These earrings have a worn, urban-vintage style look. Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

name: SRSLY PPL! Necklace
description:
This one has had people in tears at the office.

The design of this sterling silver necklace reminds me of manhole covers in NYC and the big bolts you see on the girders of bridges and subway columns. It hangs at 16" but I can make it longer if you'd like

The coin is the size of a quarter- and has the Metta Metalworks logo on the back side. 

Maybe you wear it to send a message to someone who needs it - or remind your self- not to take it all so seriously. We're not curing cancer here... or at least I'm not!

Was $98-  Now $65

Each piece comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.

Ten percent of my profits are donated to Wat Metta monastery in California, where my teacher lives.

name: OMG WTF Silver necklace
description:
Mamma always told me there would be days like these.  

MMW's double layer necklace can be the acronym out burst that won't get you in trouble with the boss.

The top "OMG" layer measures 16 inches The bottom "WTF" layer measures 18 inches. Single lobster claw closure. This is a great layeredneck for gals or guys. Please note- this is one necklace with two pendants and chains- not two separate necklaces. If ordering for a guy- let me know in the comments and we'll add a bit to the length for a better fit.

Cast in brass and plated in an oxidized silver finish the pendants have a worn, urban-vintage style look. 

Your Metta Metalworks purchase comes packaged in a beautiful amulet pouch made by Buddhist Monks at a monastery in Nepal.
